definition: to take medicine
variant of 吃[chi1]
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Many people take medicine when they are sick.
Yes, since I had it , the attack was stopped.
sentences.chinese: 有用，自从我吃药后发作就停止了。

sentences.english: Even if the stomach, also don't want to take medicine. " x0 h!"
sentences.chinese: 就算胃疼的要死，也不会想要吃药。

sentences.english: Please make an offer indicating the packing.
sentences.chinese: 吃药时请按照包装上的说明去服用。

sentences.english: Please don't eat turnip and garlic when taking this medicine.
sentences.chinese: 吃药时不要同时吃萝卜和大蒜。

sentences.english: Injections of tens of thousands take medicine, go out empty-handed back empty-handed.
sentences.chinese: 打针吃药好几万，空手出门空手返。

sentences.english: In the medicine time, Memo can remind olds , even sent the pills to them.
sentences.chinese: 会在吃药时间，给老人把药片配好，送到老人面前。

sentences.english: So she must take some medicine.
I need some boiled water to wash down medicine after breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一些开水在早饭后吃药。

sentences.english: The question ridicules it is "adult the falling ill child takes a drug", played is excessive.
sentences.chinese: 质疑者将其讥之为“大人生病小孩吃药”，玩过头了。

sentences.english: Why don't you try to sleep? I'll wake you up for the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不睡一会儿呢？到吃药时，我会叫醒你的。

sentences.english: When a doctor gives you a pill, he's playing god.
sentences.chinese: 当一个医生在给你吃药时，他就在扮演上帝。

sentences.english: Not to transfer, only "medicine" also can achieve the same effect.
sentences.chinese: 不换车，仅“吃药”也能达到相同的效果。

sentences.english: Drugs and surgery can help some people too.
sentences.chinese: 一部分人可考虑吃药和动手术。

sentences.english: Thrombus sex external piles not it is good that the operation takes medicine only?
sentences.chinese: 血栓性外痔不手术只吃药会好吗？

sentences.english: It wants twenty minutes, sir, to taking the medicine,' she commenced.
sentences.chinese: “先生，还要等二十分钟才吃药哩，”她开始说。
